TopicTitle: Black screen at KSC after leaving Kerbin's SOI

Articles.Content:
**KSP:** 1.0 Windows 32bit

**Problem:** After I switch to the SOI of another planet/body (Mun, Minmus), when I return to the KSC, it's entirely black. GUI elements are still visible, including the exit button on the lower right, and funds and such at the top. Sometimes I can mouseover and see the building descriptors in the lower left, sometimes not. This makes the game pretty much unplayable when those don't show up, as I cannot even guess where the buildings are to click and continue playing. Have to entirely quit and restart to get it working again, leaving to main menu and returning and the problem still persists.

**Mods installed:**

Module Manager 2.6.2

Kerbal Engineer Redux 1.0.16.6

Active Texture Management Release-5-0

KerboKatz 1.2.1 - Only the DisableTempGauges mod

**Reproduction steps:**

Fly a ship to the Mun, or Minmus. Currently I'm at Minmus. Hit ESC. Switch view to KSC.

**Save:**

[https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/53548028/Wolf-Hart%20Aerospace.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/53548028/Wolf-Hart%20Aerospace.zip)
